name: Get Chopping!
description:
Tidal wave a comin! Chop trees to collect logs so you can make a boat. But watch out for pigs and bears, if you hit one, they'll all get angry! 

A+D = move, space = jump

left shift (or left mouse) = throw beads/fireballs

left ctrl (or right mouse) = chop/attack

(Or works great with a controller!)

Beads will make pigs and bears dance for 15 seconds every time you get a disco ball (even angry ones!) 

Hearts replenish health, +1 hearts heal you and increase max health
